channel.title: How to make an coord command for 525 codeusa?
channel.description: yes, i was just wondering, how could this be done?

item.title: How to make an coord command for 525 codeusa?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“elpollo, post:2, topic:368474”]just add this some where in commands.java

if(cmd[0].equals(“coords”)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "[X] - " +p.absX+ " [Y] - " +p.absY+ " [H] - " +p.heightLevel);
}

and if u wan a teleport command

if (cmd[0].equals(“ur commands name”)) {
if (p.attackedBy != null) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command while in combat.”);
return;
}
p.teleportTo(2273, 4695, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
}

2273, 4695, 0,
x y are the cords where u wan to go[/quote]
i mean to find coordinates (example mypos in delta)

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an coord command for 525 codeusa?

@elpollo wrote:

just add this some where in commands.java

if(cmd[0].equals(“coords”)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "[X] - " +p.absX+ " [Y] - " +p.absY+ " [H] - " +p.heightLevel);
}

and if u wan a teleport command

if (cmd[0].equals(“ur commands name”)) {
if (p.attackedBy != null) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command while in combat.”);
return;
}
p.teleportTo(2273, 4695, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
}

x y are the cords where u wan to go
